body:
I am following the steps from this docuement(https://docs.temporal.io/docs/server/workflow-search/#custom-attributes)
I tried executing the below command. First time it let me to enter 'Y' but then it threw an error. Second time it didn't even let me enter Y. Please refer screenshot.

docker exec temporal-admin-tools tctl admin cluster add-search-attributes --name ProductId --type Keyword
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30084043/130335932-d2c67e9b-0820-4449-b727-861bfca1dc10.png)

comments.body:
@VikasNS , could you try to run shell in the admin-tools docker, then run the tctl command:
`docker exec -it temporal-admin-tools --'sh'`
then, when you are in the docker, run:
`tctl admin cluster add-search-attributes ...`
Also you can use `--auto_confirm` flag to bypass this question.

title: Unable to add Custom search attributes using tctl
